channel.title: Jeromenadaud on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Jeromenadaud on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Our plan for more regular & focused patch versions
item.description: With the adoption of SemVer-like versioning, we know that a patch version will only feature non-breaking changes, making it far safer to update to PrestaShop than ever beforeâ€¦ and thus safer for us to release patch version more regularly.

item.title: PrestaShop && the PSR-2 coding style guide
item.description: We are planning to switch to PSR-2, here is the why, the how and the when!
